summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.54.015, 23.54.020 and 23.84.018 of the Seattle Municipal Code, adopting new parking requirements for community centers operated and owned by the City of Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation (DOPAR) and for family support centers co-located in community centers operated and owned by DOPAR.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
